entry.string:
The Master Multisite has not yet been configured!

Please configure the Master Site from the menu option Multisites - Master Config.

You can then add new sites through the menu option Multisites - Add Sites.

Return here to View Sites once your have added sites to view!
entry.translation:
Zee Mester Moolteesite-a hes nut yet beee cunffeegoored!

Pleese-a cunffeegoore-a zee Mester Seete-a frum zee menoo oopshun Moolteesites - Mester Cunffeeg.

Yuoo cun zeen edd noo seetes thruoogh zee menoo oopshun Moolteesites - Edd Seetes. Um gesh dee bork, bork!

Retoorn here-a tu Feeoo Seetes oonce-a yuoor hefe-a edded seetes tu feeoo!

entry.string: Total number of sites, including Master Site:
entry.translation: Tutel noomber ooff seetes, incloodeeng Mester Seete-a:

entry.string: Note: only the Delete function is currently implemented.
entry.translation: Nute-a: oonly zee Delete-a fooncshun is coorrently implemented. Bork bork bork!
